text.div:
Summary

Defining URLhttp://terminology.hl7.org/NamingSystem/v3-SpecialArrangement
Version2.1.0
NameSpecialArrangement
TitleSpecialArrangement
Statusactive
Definition

A code indicating the type of special arrangements provided for a patient encounter (e.g., wheelchair, stretcher, interpreter, attendant, seeing eye dog). For encounters in intention moods, this information can be used to identify special arrangements that will need to be made for the incoming patient.

PublisherHealth Level Seven International

Identifiers

TypeValuePreferred
OID2.16.840.1.113883.19.6.1true
URIhttp://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-SpecialArrangementtrue
